Footer.address: Türkler Mah. Kargı Çayı Cad. No:10 Alanya/Antalya

Homepage.subtitle: Welcome to Azura World Hotel (Alanya) – All Inclusive Concept
Homepage.title: 5-Star Comfort, All Inclusive Experience
Homepage.text: Azura World Hotel is located in Türkler, Alanya/Antalya. Opening: 2025. Category: 5-star. Concept: All Inclusive. The hotel has 188 rooms, 6 floors and 2 elevators. Check-in is 14:00 and check-out is 12:00. The beach is 1 km away and a shuttle service is available.

TwoImageSection.subtitle: UNFORGETTABLE MOMENTS AT AZURA WORLD
TwoImageSection.title: Discover the Azura World experience now!
TwoImageSection.text1: Azura World Hotel offers a 5-star All Inclusive stay in Türkler (Alanya), with comfortable rooms, a Spa & Wellness area, and multiple food & beverage points throughout the day.
TwoImageSection.text2: Enjoy Indoor Pool, Oasis Pool and an Aquapark with 13 slides. The beach area stretches 125 m and offers sunbeds, umbrellas, cabins, WC and shower facilities. The beach is 1 km away and a shuttle service is available.

Accomodation.subtitle: Choose Your Perfect Accommodation
Accomodation.title: Comfortable Room Options
Accomodation.roomText1: Deluxe Rooms are 22–24.99 m². In-room amenities include TV, tea & coffee set, safe, minibar (water & soft drinks), VRF air-conditioning, electronic key card, work desk and high-speed Wi-Fi.
Accomodation.roomText2: Superior Rooms are 25–40 m². In-room amenities include TV, tea & coffee set, safe, minibar (water & soft drinks), VRF air-conditioning, electronic key card, work desk and high-speed Wi-Fi.
Accomodation.roomText3: Deluxe Family Rooms are 43–53 m². In-room amenities include TV, tea & coffee set, safe, minibar (water & soft drinks), VRF air-conditioning, electronic key card, work desk and high-speed Wi-Fi.

Essentials.subtitle: Explore Our Exceptional Services
Essentials.title: All You Need for Ultimate Comfort
Essentials.text1: Beach length: 125 m. The beach offers 120 sunbeds and 60 umbrellas; cabins, WC and showers are available. The beach is 1 km away and a shuttle service is provided.
Essentials.text2: Indoor Pool (1 main + 1 kids pool), Oasis Pool and an Aquapark with 13 slides. Aquapark hours: 10:00–12:00 / 14:00–17:00. Indoor Pool is seasonally heated (on specific dates).
Essentials.text3: Milos Restaurant (Floor B) serves buffet meals by schedule. Saffron A’la Carte is available with reservation. Patisserie Art serves desserts. Azura Beach offers snack & beverage service.
Essentials.text4: Mini Club is available as a complimentary service. (TBD)
Essentials.text5: Wi-Fi, beach towels/sunbeds/umbrellas and the shuttle to the beach are complimentary. (TBD)
Essentials.text6: Indoor Pool, steam room, Turkish bath, sauna and salt room are complimentary; massages are paid. Working hours: 08:00 – 19:00.

BackgroundSection.subtitle: Azura World Hotel
BackgroundSection.title: All Inclusive Holiday in Alanya
BackgroundSection.text: Azura World Hotel is a 5-star property in Türkler (Alanya) with an All Inclusive concept. Services and hours may vary depending on season and hotel management.

Rooms.subtitle: COMFORTABLE STAY FOR YOU AND YOUR FAMILY
Rooms.title: Feel Right at Home in Our Rooms
Rooms.text: Azura World Hotel has a total of 188 rooms. All rooms feature TV, tea & coffee set, safe, minibar (water & soft drinks), VRF air-conditioning, electronic key card, work desk and high-speed Wi-Fi. Linen is changed every 3 days; towels are changed upon guest request.

Room1.title: Deluxe Room
Room1.text: Deluxe Rooms are 22–24.99 m² and include the standard in-room amenities.

Room2.title: Deluxe Family Room
Room2.text: Deluxe Family Rooms are 43–53 m² and include the standard in-room amenities.

Room3.title: Superior Room
Room3.text: Superior Rooms are 25–40 m² and include the standard in-room amenities.

Parallax.subtitle: The Essential In-Room Amenities
Parallax.title: Everything You Need, Right in Your Room
Parallax.text: All rooms include TV, tea & coffee set, safe, minibar (water & soft drinks), VRF air-conditioning, electronic key card, work desk, high-speed Wi-Fi, balcony (table & chairs), scale, illuminated makeup mirror, emergency phone and hairdryer. Pillow menu is available with extra charge.
Parallax.text1: Minibar includes water and soft drinks.
Parallax.text2: Bathroom set and essential toiletries are available.
Parallax.text3: Electronic key card system for secure access.
Parallax.text4: High-speed Wi-Fi and TV are available.

FamilyRoom.subtitle: Comfortable Stay with Extra Space
FamilyRoom.title: Deluxe Family Room
FamilyRoom.text: Deluxe Family Rooms are 43–53 m² and offer a spacious stay option.

RoomFeatures.subtitle: FUN FOR ALL AGES
RoomFeatures.title: Deluxe Family Room
RoomFeatures.text: Deluxe Family Rooms are 43–53 m². Amenities include TV, tea & coffee set, safe, minibar (water & soft drinks), VRF air-conditioning, electronic key card, work desk and high-speed Wi-Fi.
RoomFeatures.text2: Standard in-room services are available. Linen is changed every 3 days; towels are changed upon guest request.

BackgroundSection.list1: A’la Carte Dining: One complimentary visit for stays of 7+ nights (reservation required).
BackgroundSection.list2: Spa & Wellness: Indoor Pool, steam room, Turkish bath, sauna and salt room are complimentary; massages are paid.

RoomFeatures.text: Azura World Hotel provides 2 accessible rooms. Accessible WC is available in public areas and a pool lift is available.

BeachPools.subtitle: RELAX & REFRESH BY THE SEA
BeachPools.title: Beach & Pools
BeachPools.text: Beach length: 125 m. The beach offers 120 sunbeds and 60 umbrellas; cabins, WC and showers are available. The beach is 1 km away and a shuttle service is provided.

TwoImageSection.subtitle: RELAXING MOMENTS BY THE SEA
TwoImageSection.title: Discover Our Beach Area
TwoImageSection.text: The beach area stretches 125 m. Sunbeds and umbrellas are available; cabins, WC and showers are provided for comfort.

BeachGif.subtitle: Pools Designed for Every Moment
BeachGif.title: Float Into Relaxation
BeachGif.text: Enjoy Indoor Pool, Oasis Pool and an Aquapark with 13 slides for relaxation and fun.

PoolSection.subtitle: Dive Into Our Pool Selection
PoolSection.title: All Pools at a Glance
PoolSection.text: Azura World Hotel offers Indoor Pool, Oasis Pool and Aquapark. Hours and usage may vary seasonally.
PoolSection.text1: Area: 271 m² (Kids: 14.7 m²). Depth: 137 cm (Kids: 34 cm). Sunbeds: 140 / umbrellas: 70.
PoolSection.text2: 1 main pool + 1 kids pool. Area: 102 m² + 12 m². Depth: 140 cm – 34 cm. Seasonally heated (on specific dates).
PoolSection.text3: Kids pool area: 12 m²; depth: 34 cm.
PoolSection.text4: 13 slides. Pool area: 1613 m². Depth: 120 cm (Kids: 27 cm). Hours: 10:00–12:00 / 14:00–17:00. Sunbeds: 100.

Restaurants.subtitle: Curated Culinary Experiences
Restaurants.title: Restaurants
Restaurants.text: All Inclusive concept includes Milos Restaurant (buffet by schedule), Saffron A’la Carte (reservation) and Patisserie Art (desserts). Freshly squeezed juices are extra.

Bars.title: Bars
Bars.text: Oasis Pool Bar: 10:00–22:00. Lobby Bistro Lounge: service 10:00–01:00 (area open 24/7). Flamingo Bar Aquapark: 10:00–00:00 (extra fee). Alcohol is not served to guests under 18.

Entertainment.text: Enjoy Aquapark with 13 slides, Funzone Gaming Room and other hotel areas. Details and schedules may vary seasonally.

GridSection.text3: 12×21 m, height 3.10 m, total 255 m², capacity up to 270 people.

OtherOptions.text: Indoor Pool Kids: 12 m², 34 cm. Oasis Kids Area: 14.7 m², 34 cm. Aquapark kids area depth: 27 cm.

Spa.subtitle: RELAX AT AZURA WORLD SPA & WELLNESS
Spa.title: Spa & Wellness
Spa.text: Indoor Pool, steam room, Turkish bath, sauna and salt room are complimentary; massages are paid. Working hours: 08:00 – 19:00. Free Honeymoon Package includes room decoration on arrival, sparkling wine and fruit basket, plus a SPA discount for honeymoon guests.

InfoSection.text1: Complimentary areas: Indoor Pool, steam room, Turkish bath, sauna and salt room. Massages are paid.

GallerySection.text: Relax and recharge in the hotel’s Spa & Wellness area.

SpaTypes.text1: 1 main pool + 1 kids pool. Area: 102 m² + 12 m². Depth: 140 cm – 34 cm. Seasonally heated (on specific dates).
SpaTypes.text2: Turkish bath is complimentary. Massages are paid.

Sport.subtitle: STAY ACTIVE & FIT
Sport.title: Sport & Fitness
Sport.text: Fitness Center is available as a complimentary service. Tennis and basketball courts are complimentary (court lighting may be paid).

InfoSection.text2: Tennis and basketball courts are complimentary; court lighting may be paid.

GallerySection.subtitle: Stay Fit & Energized
GallerySection.title: Fitness Center

SpaTypes.text2: Fitness Center is available as a complimentary service.

InfoSection.subtitle: Azura World Hotel
InfoSection.title: Your Holiday in Alanya
InfoSection.text: Azura World Hotel is a 5-star hotel located in Türkler, Alanya/Antalya. Opening: 2025. Concept: All Inclusive. Total rooms: 188. Floors: 6. Elevators: 2. Pets are not allowed.

MissinonVision.subtitle: Azura World Hotel
MissinonVision.title: Our Mission & Vision
MissinonVision.text: Our mission is to provide a comfortable All Inclusive holiday experience with a high service standard. Our vision focuses on sustainability and guest satisfaction.
MissinonVision.clubtext1: All Inclusive concept with Milos Restaurant, Saffron A’la Carte, Patisserie Art and all-day service areas; Indoor Pool, Oasis Pool and Aquapark with 13 slides; Spa & Wellness; complimentary Wi-Fi and shuttle to the beach.
MissinonVision.clubtext2: Complimentary: Mini Club, Fitness Center, tennis & basketball courts, beach towels/sunbeds/umbrellas, Wi-Fi, playground, shuttle to the beach, honeymoon package. Paid: airport transfer, room service, hairdresser, shops, doctor/medical, laundry, photo service, car rental, taxi, indoor parking and more.

ExploreAlanya.description1: Attracting cavers from all over the world with its fascinating formations, Dim Cave is one of Alanya’s most famous natural wonders. Located 10 km from the center, it sits 232 meters above sea level with impressive views and well-lit walkways through massive stalactites and stalagmites.
ExploreAlanya.description2: The cable car running from Damlataş to Alanya Castle offers stunning views of the city and sea, especially beautiful at sunset.
ExploreAlanya.description3: A natural paradise known for its wooden walkways and waterfalls. You can cool off in its refreshing waters and enjoy the sounds of nature.
ExploreAlanya.description4: Built in the 13th century, this shipyard is one of the best-preserved structures on the Mediterranean coast.
ExploreAlanya.description5: The house where Mustafa Kemal Atatürk stayed during his visit to Alanya now serves as a museum displaying photos and personal belongings.
ExploreAlanya.description6: One of the Mediterranean’s most beautiful beaches, where Queen Cleopatra is said to have swum. Known for golden sands and calm, shallow waters.
ExploreAlanya.description7: Located at the harbor entrance, it’s a perfect spot for a seaside walk and photography.
ExploreAlanya.description8: Right next to Damlataş Cave, this calm beach is favored for its clear waters and proximity to the city center.
ExploreAlanya.description9: Built by Seljuk Sultan Alaeddin Keykubad in the 13th century, this massive fortress sits 250 m above sea level and offers panoramic views of Alanya.
ExploreAlanya.description10: An octagonal tower made of red bricks, representing Seljuk architecture’s finest examples.
ExploreAlanya.description11: Known for its humid air beneficial to asthma, featuring dense stalactites and stalagmites.
ExploreAlanya.description12: Exhibits artifacts from the Hellenistic, Roman, and Byzantine periods, along with local handicrafts and textiles.
ExploreAlanya.description13: Hidden among forests, Syedra fascinates with its columned streets and bath ruins.
ExploreAlanya.description14: A wide sandy beach ideal for swimming, walking, and cycling along the coast.
ExploreAlanya.description15: Located inside the castle, the mosque stands out for its simple architecture and peaceful courtyard.
ExploreAlanya.description16: A small cave visited by boat tours, known for its romantic legends.
ExploreAlanya.description17: A tranquil waterfall close to the city, great for picnicking and cooling off.
ExploreAlanya.description18: A charming park designed for stray cats where families can relax and interact with animals.
ExploreAlanya.description19: An iconic seaside temple with grand Corinthian columns, especially magical at sunset.
ExploreAlanya.description20: A popular natural area near Alanya for rafting, picnics, and nature walks.
ExploreAlanya.description21: Originating from the Taurus Mountains, the Dim River is famous for its riverside restaurants, picnic spots, and cool waters.

Icon1.list1: It is important for visitors to dress appropriately, usually covering shoulders and knees.
Icon1.list2: Women should cover their heads before entering.
Icon1.list3: Shoes should not be worn inside.
Icon1.list4: Avoid speaking loudly and do not disturb people who are worshipping.
Icon1.list5: Although photography is generally not prohibited, proper permissions should be obtained.

Icon2.list1: Remain quiet so as not to disturb other visitors.
Icon2.list2: Check the museum’s photography rules at the entrance. Some exhibits may be prohibited from being photographed.
Icon2.list4: Eating and drinking are not allowed.

Icon3.list1: Act with environmental awareness to avoid harming plants and wildlife.
Icon3.list2: Collect your trash and do not leave anything harmful to nature behind.
Icon3.list3: Do not light fires unless it is explicitly permitted.
Icon3.list4: Use designated camping areas for camping.

Icon4.list1: Obtain the necessary licenses and permits for hunting.
Icon4.list3: Do not exceed the daily hunting limits.

Icon5.list1: You must protect your body from Antalya’s high temperatures.
Icon5.list2: Use sunscreen with at least SPF 50 to protect against UV rays.
Icon5.list3: Not using sunscreen may cause serious health issues.
